thread.title: Re: ‘I’m not much of an expert on hairdressing’: Bernie Sanders and Ted Cruz debate Obamacare on CNN
thread.title_full: Re: ‘I’m not much of an expert on hairdressing’: Bernie Sanders and Ted Cruz debate Obamacare on CNN

author: JosephBloughs ✓Viagrafied
title: Re: ‘I’m not much of an expert on hairdressing’: Bernie Sanders and Ted Cruz debate Obamacare on CNN
text:
— CNN Politics (@CNNPolitics) February 8, 2017 What do the Democrats say to the 6 million people who have had their policies cancelled? #CNNDebateNight https://t.co/IeWvSy6rQG pic.twitter.com/eLAjxS9rah 
— Ted Cruz (@tedcruz) February 8, 2017 Cruz: "So what is a right? It's access to health care" #CNNDebateNight https://t.co/bIRFGMYqCK https://t.co/EOGwnNxx8B 
— CNN Politics (@CNNPolitics) February 8, 2017 Cruz: "The Obamacare rules are 20,000 pages — they're taller than 7 feet tall" #CNNDebateNight https://t.co/bo6V6ygsIM 
— CNN Politics (@CNNPolitics) February 8, 2017 . @TedCruz counters Sanders on Texas' uninsured rate by noting number of people moving to Texas, Texas' population diversity vs. Vermont's 
— Patrick Svitek (@PatrickSvitek) February 8, 2017 Trending
